title: Ward Score

embed.description: Discover how well you ward in League of Legends with WardScore by EnigmaSM.

body:
Hey there Summoners,

Here's a cool site that tracks your warding capabilities.

Regards,
lols =)

replies.body: The trauma of  being taught LoL by two supports that decided to bully us by playing invisible champions in custom games until we learned to ward :/
There you go... it felt good to be the best for 20 minutes :P

Excessive... 

No such thing as excessive when it comes to wards imo. 

vision = better team work and teamwork op

{{item:2043}} {{item:2045}} {{item:2044}}
I need to work on my warding when playing fighters and marksman!

Your ward score is better than mine, looks like I gotta use more wards.

http://puu.sh/d5sIb/d06c0f933f.jpg
Of the 10 games that are tracked... Yeah, no.
Oh. I thought I did better than that :(
